SpeechToPlay.Caption: Looks like a beat to shit typewriter. Sturdy and well made though.
There's a cup of coffee. *Sniffs* Probably made some time today.
There's some food cans; they look empty.
Looks like they made a fire.
There's leaves and shit everywhere in here. It's not really safe from the elements.
Oh my God. OH MY GOD. OH--
NO. No. Not like that. Just a big stone head. Made out of rock. It's not a human head.
Look, why don't we try not to ASSUME dismemberment or decapitation from here on out, OK?
Yeah, OK. I think that'd be good.
It is weird, though. I don't think it means anything.
And no sign of Coburn or the daughter?
No. It looks like he fed her though. That's probably a good sign.
Just the phone. That's probably all I need to keep moving.
There's a bed up against the wall. Looks like two people slept here last night.
There's a cabin up a head.
Thank god, I was starting to figure we lost you.
I donít know. Last thing I remember I tied off my rope and now Iím talking to you.
Jesus, be careful. Are you OK to keep moving?
So is there a Mrs. Berkeley?
Ha, no there is definitely not.
I imagine it must be hard to be with an FBI agent, especially one that travels halfway across the country on a momentís notice.
Yeah, popular opinion would agree with that sentiment.
I imagine it must be hard to be with an FBI agent; especially one that travels halfway across the country on a momentís notice.
Thatís not really pertinent, is it?
Right now you are in a survival situation. Itís my job to not just keep you focused but to keep you relaxed. Chit chat helps.
Not that kind of chit chat.
So is there a Mrs. Berkeley? (Alt 1)
So is there a Mrs. Berkeley? (Alt 2)
